g:HTMLPanel.p: In this chapter we learned how to harness dependency injection in an application.

DI in GWT - We take the Photo Application from the MVP chapter and enhance it to use dependency injection using GIN (and Guice) The EventBus used across the application is injected via field injection, the rpc services via method (setter) injction and the views used by presenters are injected via constructor injection. Presenters themselves are obtained via on-demand injection from the Ginjector interface.
